Support

APIs.io is an open source API search engine maintained by a handful of individuals, and we are relying on just a handful of social and community ways to support the projectâ€“use one of the following channels to learn more about what is happening and get your questions answered.

LinkedIn

You can stay aware of the latest updates about APIs.io using our LinkedIn page, using the business social network as our primary way of engaging with the community via the platform.

Go
Github

All of APIs.io is managed using GitHub, with the repositories behind each of the APIs, as well as the static websites, developer portal, and administrative sites all running via GitHub.

Go
Discussions

All discussions around building and evolving the APIs.io search engine, as well as the creation of individual APIs.json files for specific APIs are conducted via GitHub discussions.

Go

Thank you for getting involved and helping out where you can, making it a community effort to get this search engine stood up, indexing, and making the world of APIs more discoverable in a way that benefits everyone.
